Articles.Content:
Hi from watchnasatvcom,

This is an excellent creation gentlemen. Learning and understanding the basics of orbital mechanics while having a blast. I think every grade school kid should get this game as a part of physics. I\'m doing a let\'s play KSP Insane Rockets Division. Would love for there to be some official link on the devs permission. You tube can be quite picky about such things.

Link for ep1:

Cheers!

Thor chief engineer KSP IRD

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

The devs don\'t mind people posting videos of KSP on YouTube as long as they aren\'t derogatory or defamatory.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Hey, hey!

I love this! I\'ll be watching it all. I just subscribed on youtube.

Thanks!

-Drakomis

My thanks to the devs!

I\'m really having fun with the game. The next episode is recorded and should be uploaded soon. Looking forward to all the content to come.

P.S. I went ahead and bought/donated for 15$ well worth every penny/peso .

Thanks witeken!

I\'ve been having a blast poking around. Lots of cool people here and tons of info. I\'m going to try some mods soon.

BTW I\'d buy that plush! Too cool.
